midi
Class MusicEvent

java.lang.Object
  midi.MusicEvent

public class MusicEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a musical event which is either a note or a rest. The event has a specified duration that the event should last

Nested Class Summary
static class MusicEvent.EventType
          Represents what this EventType encodes.

          Constructs a Event from a String.

          Plays this note item on an Instrument.

Constructor Detail

MusicEvent

public MusicEvent(MusicEvent.EventType type,
                  int duration,
                  Note n)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a Event of a specific type with a Note and duration.

Parameters:
type - the type of Event
duration - the duration
n - the Note
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the constructor is passed a EventType of NOTE and the Note is unspecified (null).

MusicEvent

public MusicEvent(java.lang.String note)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a Event from a String. The String is of the format: 
{noteString | "r"}["-"]
Where noteString is a valid string for the parseNoteString(String str) of Note.

Parameters:
note - the String to parse
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String is of the wrong format
See Also:
Note.parseNoteString(String)
Method Detail

play

public void play(Instrument i)
Plays this note item on an Instrument.

Parameters:
i - the Instrument to play
